item.title: Fix Broken Comments Count for Disqus
item.author: gonzih@gmail.com (Max Gonzih)
item.description: I just figured out that my disqus account was attached to gonzih.github.com but my blog was actually hosted using blog.gonzih.org domain. That is why comments count was equal to 0 for every post on my index page. To fix that go to admin ui in disqus and use domain migration tool.

item.title: How To Fix Octopress Pygments Error on Arch Linux
item.author: gonzih@gmail.com (Max Gonzih)
item.description:
If your get following pygments error using octopress with arch linux.

Building site: source -> public
  File "<string>", line 1
    import sys; print sys.executable
                        ^
SyntaxError: invalid syntax

It’s happens because RubyPython use Python version 2 by calling “python” command. By default python equal to python3 in Arch Linux.
